string-array.name: place_desc
string-array.item: Charles Montgomery Burns, a.k.a. Monty Burns, commonly referred to simply as Mr. Burns
Marjorie Jacqueline "Marge" Simpson (née Bouvier) is a fictional character in the American animated sitcom The Simpsons and part of the eponymous family
The main character of the Simpsons show
She is young and smart. She is the brain-child.
